analysis.key_quote: I don't see why any Federal employees should have to make an oath of loyalty to a President - if seems to me that they would be personal assistants to said President rather than servants to the public.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about federal employees being required to show loyalty to a President, which implies a fear of politicization and undermines the nonpartisan nature of civil service. This aligns with opposition to the proposed rule.
